lines.text:
[Looking at Clint]
Beautiful! I think he's beautiful!

[Thinking he's been propositioned]
Hey, uh, what kind of game is this anyway?
Now, look, Honey. I was born in Texas, but it wasn't yesterday.
I've seen lots of women, but I've never seen a woman like you.
Look, I got a temper too - stronger than horseradish.
Ah, but Colonel Maroon, this isn't the Wild West.
If you mean to harm me, she'd be likely to kill you. She'd make a little figure like you out of soap, but she'd stick little pins into it, and you'd sicken and die.
Not I. I've had pins stuck in me all my life and - knives and everything up to pickaxes.

[to Clio]
I know my way around this world. I know what it is to be very rich. I know what it is to be very poor. I've lived on nothing for years... in luxury.
Here's your ring. Hang on to your jewelry. I always say it's a woman's best friend.
